createinvestigation.name: CreateInvestigation
createinvestigation.description: Grants permission to create a new investigation in the specified investigation group

createinvestigationevent.name: CreateInvestigationEvent
createinvestigationevent.description: Grants permission to create a new investigation event in the specified investigation group

createinvestigationgroup.name: CreateInvestigationGroup
createinvestigationgroup.description: Grants permission to create a new investigation group

createinvestigationresource.name: CreateInvestigationResource
createinvestigationresource.description: Grants permission to create an investigation resource in the specified investigation group

createreport.name: CreateReport
createreport.description: Grants permission to create a new report in the specified investigation

deleteinvestigation.name: DeleteInvestigation
deleteinvestigation.description: Grants permission to delete an investigation in the specified investigation group

deleteinvestigationgroup.name: DeleteInvestigationGroup
deleteinvestigationgroup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified investigation group

deleteinvestigationgrouppolicy.name: DeleteInvestigationGroupPolicy
deleteinvestigationgrouppolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the investigation group policy attached to an investigation group

generatereport.name: GenerateReport
generatereport.description: Grants permission to generate a report in the specified investigation report

getephemeralinvestigationresults.name: GetEphemeralInvestigationResults
getephemeralinvestigationresults.description: Grants permission to run and retrieve ephemeral investigation results

getfact.name: GetFact
getfact.description: Grants permission to retrieve a fact in the specified investigation report

getfactversions.name: GetFactVersions
getfactversions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all versions of a fact token in the specified investigation report

getinvestigation.name: GetInvestigation
getinvestigation.description: Grants permission to retrieve an investigation in the specified investigation group

getinvestigationevent.name: GetInvestigationEvent
getinvestigationevent.description: Grants permission to retrieve an investigation event in the specified investigation group

getinvestigationgroup.name: GetInvestigationGroup
getinvestigationgroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified investigation group

getinvestigationgrouppolicy.name: GetInvestigationGroupPolicy
getinvestigationgrouppolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the investigation group policy attached to an investigation group

getinvestigationresource.name: GetInvestigationResource
getinvestigationresource.description: Grants permission to retrieve an investigation resource in the specified investigation group

getreport.name: GetReport
getreport.description: Grants permission to retrieve a report in the specified investigation

listfacts.name: ListFacts
listfacts.description: Grants permission to list all facts in the specified investigation report

listinvestigationevents.name: ListInvestigationEvents
listinvestigationevents.description: Grants permission to list all investigation events in the specified investigation group

listinvestigationgroups.name: ListInvestigationGroups
listinvestigationgroups.description: Grants permission to list all investigation groups in the AWS account making the request

listinvestigations.name: ListInvestigations
listinvestigations.description: Grants permission to list all investigations that are in the specified investigation group

listreports.name: ListReports
listreports.description: Grants permission to list all reports in the specified investigation

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified resource

putfact.name: PutFact
putfact.description: Grants permission to create or update a new fact in the specified investigation report

putinvestigationgrouppolicy.name: PutInvestigationGroupPolicy
putinvestigationgrouppolicy.description: Grants permission to create/update the investigation group policy attached to an investigation group

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or update the specified tags for the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the specified tags from the specified resource

updateinvestigation.name: UpdateInvestigation
updateinvestigation.description: Grants permission to update an investigation in the specified investigation group

updateinvestigationevent.name: UpdateInvestigationEvent
updateinvestigationevent.description: Grants permission to update an investigation event in the specified investigation group

updateinvestigationgroup.name: UpdateInvestigationGroup
updateinvestigationgroup.description: Grants permission to update the specified investigation group

updatereport.name: UpdateReport
updatereport.description: Grants permission to update a report in the specified investigation

validateinvestigationgroup.name: ValidateInvestigationGroup
validateinvestigationgroup.description: Grants permission to validate the specified investigation group
